cars.description: This is an immaculate 2016 Maserati Birdcage with only 10 miles on it. Leather seats, and should inclide wings.
This is an immaculate 2014 Bugatti Veyron with only 1500 miles on it. Leather seats, and 1000 horsepower.
This is an immaculate 2015 Porsche Spyder with only 2500 miles on it. Leather seats, and drives like a dream.
